Rachna Sagar DigiText Home Screen NEXT SKIP GOT IT Welcome to Rachna Sagar DigiText App You can easily buy Paperback and e-book with this application. You can also read e-book and Interactive e-book in this application.
Register Page New Users: Kindly register with us. Registered Users: Login using your registered email ID and password
Multiple Tab Method to download: 1. Download:
2. Website: Tap to view rachnasagar.in website to buy paperback, ebooks, etc. 3. Ebook: Ebook: Tap to read e-book Interactive Ebook: Tap to read interactive e-book
4. Click the Download button. The book will be downloaded in pdf file format.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data Play Again
